S

Screen - Class in environment.graphics
An object that denotes the array of pixels that are displayed on the JFrame.
Screen(int, int) - Constructor for class environment.graphics.Screen
Creates a Screen object that will be displayed.
Section - Class in environment.logic
A self defining data structure used to store a level in the game.
Section(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class environment.logic.Section
Constructs a new Section while also generating its corresponding child Sections based on the predefined maximum width and height of a section.
setColor(int) - Method in class environment.graphics.Screen
Fills the screen with a set colour.
setColor(Integer) - Method in class environment.logic.constructs.TransitionScreen
Changes the colour of the TransitionScreen.
setup() - Method in class tests.TestEntity
 
setup() - Method in class tests.TestGraphicalObject

Sets the x coordinate of the construct.
setX(int) - Method in class environment.logic.constructs.enemies.Arganok
Sets the int x coordinate of the Arganok while also moving the region in which the Arganok hovers.

Sprite - Class in environment.logic.entities
Encapsulates the behaviour of a sprite which is denoted by a collection of SpriteFrame Entitys.
Sprite(SpriteDetails, int, int) - Constructor for class environment.logic.entities.Sprite
Constructs a new Sprite.
If the path is invalid an IOException will be thrown.
Sprite(ArrayList<Entity>, int, int) - Constructor for class environment.logic.entities.Sprite
Constructs a new Sprite.
Sprite(Entity, int, int) - Constructor for class environment.logic.entities.Sprite
Constructs a new Sprite.
SpriteDetails - Class in environment.logic
 
SpriteDetails(String, int, int) - Constructor for class environment.logic.SpriteDetails
 
SpriteFrame - Class in environment.graphics.objects
Function:
SpriteFrame(Integer[][]) - Constructor for class environment.graphics.objects.SpriteFrame
Constructs a new SpriteFrame graphical object.
SpriteSheetReader - Class in resources
The SpriteSheetReader class is intended for extracting sprite sheets from image files, SpriteSheetReader has one public method which fetches the sprite sheet from a target path.
start() - Static method in class environment.Main
Starts the level and initialises the player.
StartPosition - Static variable in class environment.logic.Level
Stores the position the player will start at when the level is played.
startThreads() - Method in class environment.ThreadHandler
Starts the threads required to run the game.
StartX - Static variable in class environment.logic.Level
Stores the X position of the start of the current level in relation to the left side of the screen.
stopThreads() - Method in class environment.ThreadHandler
Stops the threads required to run the game causing the game to stop.
